subject: Football
Concussions
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: After a beating last summer that left him with a concussion, Badgers running back Montee Ball is back to being one of the nation’s top players and his team is contending in the Big Ten.
snippet: After a beating last summer that left him with a concussion, Badgers running back Montee Ball is back to being one of the nation’s top players and his team is contending in the Big Ten.
